name: Cephala
description:
This is the first project I've ever 'finished', and the first one I've made public.

It's been great learning lots of new things for this project, such as the particle system, creating a water texture, post-processing, and the lighting setup to create the caustic effect (light hitting the surfaces).

For anybody who is struggling to finish a project, I would highly recommend entering a game jam for motivation!

Get in touch

I'll resurrect my Twitter account in case anybody wants to reach out @MikeMcBrideUX
